scripts._comment: todo browserify call to gulp script
scripts.build-dev: gulp build-dev & browserify -t [babelify --stage 0] -t lessify -x react -x react-router -x react-bootstrap -x react-bootstrap-grid -x redux -x react-redux client/source/app.js > client/build/app.js
scripts.build: gulp build & browserify -r react -r react-router -r react-bootstrap -r react-bootstrap-grid -r redux -r react-redux > client/build/vendor.js & browserify -t [babelify --stage 0] -t lessify -x react -x react-router -x react-bootstrap -x react-bootstrap-grid -x redux -x react-redux client/source/app.js > client/build/app.js
scripts.watch-client: watchify -t [babelify --stage 0] -t lessify -x react -x react-router -x react-bootstrap -x react-bootstrap-grid -x redux -x react-redux client/source/app.js -o client/build/app.js
